item.title: ABC Mouse
item.description:
Description: More than 450 lessons in six levels. As the child completes each lesson, he or she is guided to the next one and is motivated to continue learning by ABCmouse.com’s Tickets and Rewards System.

Website: www.abcmouse.com
item.dc:creator: digitaljlearning

item.title: Achieve3000
item.description:
Description: Achieve3000 provides the only web-based, differentiated instruction solutions designed to reach a school's entire student population — mainstream, English Language Learners, special needs, and gifted.

Website: www.achieve3000.com
item.dc:creator: ykirschner

item.title: Activate Instruction
item.description:
Description: Activate Instruction is a free online tool that gives K-12 students an enriched, personalized learning experience through playlists created and shared by teachers nationwide. With user-friendly access to a rich supply of standards-based content, Activate lets you efficiently gather, organize and share standards-aligned resources to help each of your students.

Website: www.activateinstruction.org
item.dc:creator: digitaljlearning

item.title: Actively Learn
item.description:
Description: Interactive reading tool for Social Studies, Science and ELA classes. Students think more, write more, and collaborate with their peers when they read.

Website: www.activelylearn.com
item.dc:creator: ykirschner

item.title: Adaptive Curriculum
item.description:
Description: With Adaptive Curriculum, you can deepen your Middle or High School curriculum with interactive, 100% online instruction.

Website: www.adaptivecurriculum.com
item.dc:creator: digitaljlearning

item.title: ALEKS
item.description:
Description: Assessment and LEarning in Knowledge Spaces is a Web-based, artificially intelligent assessment and learning system. ALEKS uses adaptive questioning to quickly and accurately determine exactly what a student knows and doesn't know in a course.

Website: www.aleks.com
item.dc:creator: digitaljlearning

item.title: Aleph Beta Academy
item.description:
Description: Aleph Beta Academy is committed to the relevance of Jewish learning. Together with world-renowned educators, they're is building an online library to make this material accessible to students around the world.

Website:  www.alephbeta.org
item.dc:creator: digitaljlearning

item.title: All About Explorers
item.description: Description: All About Explorers was developed by a group of teachers as a means of teaching students about the Internet and digital citizenship. Although the Internet can be a tremendous resource for gathering information about a topic, they found that students often did not have the skills to discern useful information from worthless data. All About Explorers has a series of lessons for elementary age students in which they can learn that that just because it is out there for the searching does not mean it is worthwhile.
item.dc:creator: ykirschner

item.title: Amplify
item.description:
Description: Amplify is making personalized learning an attainable reality for all school districts. The Amplify Tablet, Amplify Curriculum and Amplify Professional Services are designed to help K-12 teachers provide instruction that is tailored to each student’s individual needs.

Website: www.amplify.com
item.dc:creator: digitaljlearning

item.title: Answerables
item.description: Description: Answerables is a platform that allows educators to create immersive virtual classrooms in a 3D multiplayer environment. It has been described as LMS meets video game. Teachers create as many virtual classrooms as they need, add students, assignments, and share any web based digital content (websites, online games, videos, google docs) all inside a 3D virtual world. They can then meet with their students (as avatars) inside the platform where they can use voice/video/text chat to communicate with each other remotely.
item.dc:creator: ykirschner
